title: [BUG] Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException
body:
**Description**
I got this error when try open a page with skia:SKLottieView
Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException: 'Handler not found for view SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls.SKCanvasView.'

**Code**
I initialize Skia like documentation said
```
 var builder = MauiApp.CreateBuilder();
		builder
			.UseMauiApp<App>()
            .UseMauiCommunityToolkit()
            .UseSkiaSharp()
            .ConfigureFonts(fonts =>
			{
				fonts.AddFont("OpenSans-Regular.ttf", "OpenSansRegular");
				fonts.AddFont("OpenSans-Semibold.ttf", "OpenSansSemibold");
                fonts.AddFont("arista_pro_bold.ttf", "AristaProBold");
                fonts.AddFont("arista_pro_light.ttf", "AristaProLight");
            });
```

I have this to show lottie
```
<skia:SKLottieView
            Grid.Row="1"
            RepeatCount="-1"
            Source="ic_trophy.json"
            HeightRequest="300"
            WidthRequest="300"/>
```
**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.0.0-preview.61
- Last known good version:  None
- IDE:  Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Current Version 17.3.2
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Android: Android 11 e 12
  
<details>
  <summary>Detailed IDE/OS information (click to expand)</summary>
  

comments.author: FreakyAli
comments.body: Check if you are missing the following NuGet: SkiaSharp.Views.Maui

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Is this still happening in the latest release? I think the maui package was installed as I see the `UseSkiaSharp` in the program. But I have been testing now and I have not had any issues.
